# Introduction
Fetch the stock market data in Java

# Development
```shell
cds deploy --to sqlite:./tmp/db.sqlite
cds deploy --profile pg
```

```shell
{
    "name": "stockmarket4j-cds",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "Generated by cds-services-archetype",
    "license": "ISC",
    "repository": "<Add your repository here>",
    "cds": {
        "requires": {
            "db": {
                "kind": "postgres",
                "impl": "@cap-js/postgres",
                "pool": {
                    "acquireTimeoutMillis": 3000
                },
                "vcap": {
                    "label": "postgresql-db"
                }
            }
        },
        "requires": {
            "db": {
                "kind": "sqlite",
                "credentials": {
                    "url": "db.sqlite"
                },
                "schema_evolution": "auto"
            }
        }
    },
    "dependencies": {
        "@cap-js/postgres": "^1.8.0",
        "@sap/cds-dk": "^7.9.4"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "cds-plugin-ui5": "^0.9.3"
    }
}



```
